# hitachi_vsp_one_storage (Data Source)

VSP Storage System VSP One: It returns the storage device related information.

## Example Usage

```terraform
#
# Hitachi VSP One Storage Information Retrieval
#
# This section defines a data source block that retrieves detailed information
# about a specific Hitachi VSP storage system using the "hitachi_vsp_one_storage" data source.
#
# The data source allows you to access configuration and property details of an existing
# storage device, enabling you to reference its attributes in Terraform configurations
# and automate resource dependencies.
#
# Adjust the parameters (for example, serial) to match your environment and retrieve
# information for the desired storage system.
#

data "hitachi_vsp_one_storage" "s12345" {
  serial = 12345
  with_estimated_configurable_capacities = true
}

output "s12345" {
  value = data.hitachi_vsp_one_storage.s12345
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `serial` (Number) Serial number of the storage system

### Optional

- `storage_system_admin` (Block List) VSP One Storage system output (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--storage_system_admin))
- `with_estimated_configurable_capacities` (Boolean) Flag to select whether to display configurable estimation information.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedblock--storage_system_admin"></a>
### Nested Schema for `storage_system_admin`

Optional:

- `estimated_configurable_pool_capacity` (Number) Estimated configurable pool capacity (MiB) for Dynamic Provisioning pools. Only if withEstimatedConfigurableCapacities is true. If not valid, returns -1.
- `estimated_configurable_volume_capacity` (Number) Estimated configurable volume capacity (MiB) for volumes from Dynamic Provisioning pools. Only if withEstimatedConfigurableCapacities is true. If not valid, returns -1.

Read-Only:

- `dkc_micro_version` (String) DKC Main Version. Example: 'A3-04-01-40/00'
- `esm_os_version` (String) ESM OS Version. Example: 'A3-04-01/00'
- `esm_status` (String) ESM status
- `free_pool_capacity` (Number) POOL total free capacity (POOL effective capacity - POOL total used capacity) (MiB)
- `free_pool_capacity_with_ti_pool` (Number) POOL effective capacity - POOL total used capacity (MiB) with TI pool. If unsupported, returns -1.
- `gum_version` (String) GUM Version. Example: 'A3-04-01/00'
- `ip_address_ipv4_ctl1` (String) (nullable) IPv4 address (CTL01)
- `ip_address_ipv4_ctl2` (String) (nullable) IPv4 address (CTL02)
- `ip_address_ipv4_service` (String) (nullable) IPv4 service address
- `ip_address_ipv6_ctl1` (String) (nullable) IPv6 address (CTL01)
- `ip_address_ipv6_ctl2` (String) (nullable) IPv6 address (CTL02)
- `ip_address_ipv6_service` (String) (nullable) IPv6 service address
- `model_name` (String) Model name
- `nickname` (String) Nickname
- `number_of_free_drives` (Number) Number of available drives
- `number_of_total_servers` (Number) Number of registered servers
- `number_of_total_volumes` (Number) Number of created volumes
- `saving_effects` (Block List) Saving effects and efficiency data (see nested fields) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--storage_system_admin--saving_effects))
- `serial` (String) Serial number
- `total_physical_capacity` (Number) Total capacity (sum) of parity groups (MiB)
- `total_pool_capacity` (Number) POOL effective capacity (MiB)
- `total_pool_capacity_with_ti_pool` (Number) POOL effective capacity (MiB) with TI pool. If unsupported, returns -1.
- `total_pool_physical_capacity` (Number) POOL total capacity (MiB)
- `total_pool_physical_capacity_with_ti_pool` (Number) POOL total capacity (MiB) with TI pool. If unsupported, returns -1.
- `used_pool_capacity` (Number) POOL total used capacity (MiB)
- `used_pool_capacity_with_ti_pool` (Number) POOL total used capacity (MiB) with TI pool. If unsupported, returns -1.
- `warning_led_status` (String) LED Status. OFF: normal, ON: blocked/faulty, BLINK: unreferenced SIM, Unknown: unknown

<a id="nestedblock--storage_system_admin--saving_effects"></a>
### Nested Schema for `storage_system_admin.saving_effects`

Read-Only:

- `calculation_end_time` (String) Calculation end date and time. If unsupported or status not valid, returns null.
- `calculation_start_time` (String) Calculation start date and time of. If unsupported or status not valid, returns null.
- `data_reduction_without_system_data` (Number) Total reduction effect ratio by capacity reduction function (value multiplied by 100). If unsupported or status not valid, returns -1.
- `data_reduction_without_system_data_status` (String) Status: NotSupported, Valid, CalculationInProgress, NoTargetData, Unknown
- `efficiency_data_reduction` (Number) System-wide controller-based capacity reduction effect ratio. Returns (n x 100) for n:1. If no pool exists or no user data is in the pool, returns -1.
- `efficiency_fmd_saving` (Number) Always returns -1.
- `is_total_efficiency_support` (Boolean) TotalEfficiency support flag
- `post_capacity_data_reduction` (Number) System-wide controller-based capacity after reduction (MiB)
- `post_capacity_data_reduction_without_system_data` (Number) System-wide controller-based capacity after reduction (MiB). If unsupported, returns -1.
- `post_capacity_fmd_saving` (Number) Always returns 0.
- `pre_capacity_data_reduction` (Number) System-wide controller-based capacity before reduction (MiB)
- `pre_capacity_data_reduction_without_system_data` (Number) System-wide controller-based capacity before reduction (MiB). If unsupported, returns -1.
- `pre_capacity_fmd_saving` (Number) Always returns 0.
- `software_saving_without_system_data` (Number) Data reduction ratio by capacity reduction function (value multiplied by 100). If unsupported or status not valid, returns -1.
- `software_saving_without_system_data_status` (String) Status: NotSupported, Valid, CalculationInProgress, NoTargetData, Unknown
- `total_efficiency` (Number) Sum ratio of data reduction effect (excluding system data), snapshot effect, and provisioning effect (value multiplied by 100). If unsupported or status not valid, returns -1.
- `total_efficiency_status` (String) Status: NotSupported, Valid, CalculationInProgress, NoTargetData, Unknown
